pullrequest.title: Port Dynamic Lines and Renderable to ogre

content.raw:
nice, I only have minor comments on style.

It’s noticed that the PR is targeted at `ign-rendering2`. This is fine since the changes here don’t break ABI. We would need to merge forward to `default` in order for the VisualMarker class to use it.
content.html:
nice, I only have minor comments on style.

It’s noticed that the PR is targeted at ign-rendering2. This is fine since the changes here don’t break ABI. We would need to merge forward to default in order for the VisualMarker class to use it.
